solution_line_template: A group of 10 people is charged ${admission_charge} + ${tour_charge} = ${cost_per_person_with_tour} each.

A group of {group_size_admission_only} people pays ${admission_charge} x {group_size_admission_only} = $<<{admission_charge}*{group_size_admission_only}={total_cost_group_admission_only}>>{total_cost_group_admission_only} for the admission.

Thus, the aqua park earns a total of ${total_cost_group_with_tour} + ${total_cost_group_admission_only} = $<<{total_cost_group_with_tour}+{total_cost_group_admission_only}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
